patterns: In what way can you help?
responses: I can guide you through what services Generic Inc. provides, order tracking, people to be contacted and more
I can provide support related to technical, management, order, and tracking related queries, along with much more.

patterns: Where is my order with id 561A24?
responses: Your order will have been given a development team. This team should update you on its development
Your designated development team should inform you of the projects progress

patterns: I want an appoitment with IT
I want to talk to someone in charge
responses: Please contact this email with who you wish to meet and the requested date. appointmentscb@genericinc.org

patterns: How much will the project cost?
how much will this cost me?
responses: The cost of your project will depend on what you request. Please discuss your idea with your team. It will not be free though.
The cost of a project changes with what you want. You will need to discuss with your designated team. It will not be free though.
A projects cost changes depending on what you want. Please contact your team to discuss requirements. It will not be free.

patterns: How long does a project take?
How long do i have to wait?
How long do you take to make a piece of software?
responses: The time of a project will depend on what you request. Please discuss your idea with your team.
The time needed for a project changes with what you want. You will need to discuss with your designated team.
A projects timeframe changes depending on what you want. Please contact your team to discuss requirements.
If the project has been signed off a refund is not possible. To make a complaint please contact complaintscb@genericinc.org
I refund is not possible if the project has been signed off. Please contact complaintscb@genericinc.org to make a complaint

patterns: How much experience do your teams have?
How do I know you're good
responses: Our team members have a wide range of experience. However, each has had their abilities checked and are of a high standard.
Our development teams contain members who worked on many project and their skills are refined and widespread
The development teams are all highly capable and their skills have been tested frequently.
Please contact complaintscb@genericinc.org to formally complain
To formally complain please contact complaintscb@genericinc.org
Contact complaintscb@genericinc.org to complain.

patterns: I want to know about your company
responses: Our company was founded on February 18th 2022 by Henry Generic. We aim to create bespoke software for those who need it

Founded by Henry Generic on the 18th of Feb 2022. We aim to provide bespoke software for those who want it

patterns: Something is wrong with my product.
responses: Contact the email given at the end of the project. It should be similar to maintainence[ID Number]@genericinc.org. If you no longer have this email please contact maintainencecb@genericinc.org

At the end of the project you should have been give an email similar to maintainence[ID Number]@genericinc.org. Please contact this email. If you no longer have this email please contact maintainencecb@genericinc.org
